title: MCoC Tier List
description: This is a MCoC tier list that ranks the best champions in the game. The list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier, with S Tier being the best and C Tier being the worst. The tier list is based on the opinions of several experienced MCoC players and YouTubers. It is important to note that this is just a general guideline, and the best champion for you will depend on your playstyle and the specific content you are trying to complete.
heading: MCoC Tier List
introText: This is a MCoC tier list that ranks the best champions in the game. The list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier, with S Tier being the best and C Tier being the worst. The tier list is based on the opinions of several experienced MCoC players and YouTubers. It is important to note that this is just a general guideline, and the best champion for you will depend on your playstyle and the specific content you are trying to complete.

data.itemDescription: Archangel is a fantastic champion for both offensive and defensive play. He has great damage output, regeneration, and the ability to evade attacks
Kitty Pryde is one of the most versatile champions in the game. She can phase through attacks, nullify debuffs, and has a very high critical hit rate
Domino is a great all-around champion with a mix of damage, utility, and survivability. She can also be very effective against robots
Wolverine is a classic choice for a reason. He has great regeneration, damage output, and bleed immunity

Weapon X is a newer champion who has quickly become one of the best in the game. He has a unique ability that allows him to copy the abilities of other champions, which makes him very adaptable to different situations
Apocalypse is a powerful mutant with great damage output and the ability to nullify debuffs
Bishop is a fantastic counter to mystics with his ability to neutralize their abilities. He also has great damage output and regeneration
Colossus is a tank who can shrug off a ton of damage. He also has great damage output and the ability to heal himself
Magneto OG is a classic choice for a reason. He has great crowd control abilities and can dish out a lot of damage
Omega Red is a newer champion who has quickly become one of the best in the game. He has a unique ability that allows him to inflict a permanent passive damage debuff on his opponents
Namor is a great counter to skill champions with his ability to nullify their abilities. He also has great damage output and regeneration
Havoc is a fantastic champion for dealing damage to bleed immune opponents. He also has great synergy with other mutants
Storm is a versatile champion who can be used in a variety of situations. She has great damage output, crowd control abilities, and the ability to purify debuffs
Stryfe is a newer champion who has a unique ability that allows him to steal the abilities of his opponents. He also has great damage output
Sunspot is a great champion for dealing damage to incinerate immune opponents. He also has great synergy with other science champions
Dani Moonstar is a newer champion who has a unique ability that allows her to mark her opponents and then deal bonus damage to them. She also has great synergy with other mutants
Dust is a great champion for dealing damage to evade immune opponents. She also has great synergy with other cosmic champions
